title: Past Redemption
description: The word is out on Susto. It's a new recreational drug that intensifies sex, it's spreading like wildfire - and it's lethal. Team Darkwing's mission is to track the drug back to its origin. Immersing themselves in New York's nightlife, they discover ties between Susto's revenue and the country's most powerful political dynasty.
author: Savannah Russe
